item.title: 2016-03-26-lambdaconf
item.description:
Thoughts on LambdaConf 2016

This article is written in response to the article Wrestling With Inclusion at LambdaConf. Twitter hashtag #lambdaconf.

We need to understand the consequences of our decisions. You decide to take an action, and then consequences follow. In this case, a racist speaker was given a speaking â€¦
item.dc:creator: Alissa Pajer
